item.title: 美国数据强劲，债券和股票承压：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市走低、国债遭到大量抛售之后，亚洲股市谨慎开盘，因为可靠的美国工厂数据强化了美联储不会急于降息的猜测。【原文：Asian equities were poised for a cautious open after US stocks edged lower and Treasuries sold heavily as solid US factory data reinforced speculation that the Federal Reserve will be in no rush to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 美国希望查封与前刚果领导人有关的纽约市豪华公寓
item.description: 根据周一在纽约公开的法庭文件，美国正试图查封位于曼哈顿的一处豪华公寓，据称该公寓是用刚果政府掠夺的资金为该国长期总统德尼-萨苏-恩格索的女儿购买的。【原文：The US is trying to seize a luxury apartment in Manhattan allegedly bought with money looted from the government of Congo for the daughter of that country’s longtime President Denis Sassou Nguesso, according to court papers made public in New York Monday.】

item.title: T.罗尔-普莱斯在代理权争夺战中支持迪斯尼董事会
item.description: 随着激烈的代理权争夺战接近尾声，华特迪士尼公司赢得了资产管理公司 T. Rowe Price 的支持。【原文：Walt Disney Co. has won the support of asset manager T. Rowe Price as its heated proxy battle approaches the finale.】

item.title: Calvin Klein 所有者 PVH 因警告欧洲经济疲软而暴跌 20
item.description: PVH 公司发布的全年销售指导低于预期，该公司股价在尾盘暴跌 20%。【原文：PVH Corp. shares plunged 20% in late trading after the company gave full-year sales guidance that fell short of expectations.】

item.title: 麦肯锡为部分离职员工提供九个月工资
item.description: 麦肯锡公司（McKinsey & Co：拿着九个月的工资走人。【原文：McKinsey & Co. has made a unique offer to some of its staff: Take nine months’ pay and go away.】

item.title: Ares 以 "土地价值 "出售 1.13 亿美元的丹佛办公楼抵押贷款
item.description: 房地产投资管理公司 Cress Capital 表示，该公司以相当于土地成本的价格从 Ares Management Corp.【原文：Cress Capital, a real estate investment manager, said it acquired a $113 million mortgage on a Denver office tower from an Ares Management Corp. affiliate for the equivalent of the land cost.】

item.title: Citadel的肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）认为经济增长 "温和"，对美国债务发出警告
item.description: Citadel 公司创始人肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）告诉投资者，他预计未来几个季度经济将温和增长，并称美国国债是一个 "不容忽视的日益严重的问题"。【原文：Citadel founder Ken Griffin told investors he expects modest economic growth in upcoming quarters and cited US national debt as a “growing concern that cannot be overlooked.”】

item.title: 老虎环球风险投资基金以低于目标 63% 的价格完成 22 亿美元的投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，老虎环球管理公司（Tiger Global Management）为其最新的风险投资基金募集了约 22 亿美元，远低于 60 亿美元的目标，也是近十年来募集资金最少的一次。【原文：Tiger Global Management gathered about $2.2 billion for its latest venture-capital fund, well short of a $6 billion target and its smallest fundraising haul in roughly a decade, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷驳回对冲基金关于国内生产总值挂钩证券的诉讼
item.description: 阿根廷胜诉，驳回了奥勒留资本管理公司和其他对冲基金要求支付与南美国家经济表现挂钩的证券的诉讼。【原文：Argentina won the dismissal of lawsuits by Aurelius Capital Management and other hedge funds seeking payment on securities tied to the performance of the South American nation’s economy.】

item.title: 墨西哥将停止部分石油出口，进一步挤压全球市场
item.description: 墨西哥国家控制的石油公司计划在未来几个月内停止部分原油出口，此举将减少日益紧缩的全球市场供应。【原文：Mexico’s state-controlled oil company plans to halt some crude exports over the next few months, a move that would cut supply from a tightening global market.】

item.title: 美国狂热的公司债券销售几乎没有停止的迹象
item.description: 复活节后的一天通常是美国公司债券销售的淡季，但事实证明，周一却并非如此。【原文：The day after Easter is often quiet for company bond sales in the US, but it’s proving to be anything but on Monday.】

item.title: 数据显示，美联储银行借贷计划 "好得让人无法拒绝
item.description: 根据 Wrightson ICAP 对上周公布的数据进行的分析，美联储旧金山地区的银行在 1 月份加大使用关键贷款机制的机构中居首位，因为它们利用了最后的宽松借贷成本窗口。【原文：Banks in the Federal Reserve’s San Francisco district led institutions that ramped up use of a key facility in January, as they took advantage of a final window of generous borrowing costs, according to Wrightson ICAP’s analysis of data released last week.】

item.title: 纽约学院必须提高入学率或出售教学楼
item.description: 纽约沃恩航空技术学院与市政债券持有人达成协议，要求该学院在秋季学期之前增加学生人数，否则就必须出售位于阿斯托里亚的一栋培训大楼。【原文：New York’s Vaughn College of Aeronautics and Technology has struck a deal with its municipal bondholders that requires it to add more students by the fall semester or else it must sell a training building in Astoria.】

item.title: 日元因美国数据走软，日本外汇干预风险上升
item.description: 由于强劲的美国工厂数据提振了美元，日元正朝着1美元兑152日元的关键水平走弱，交易员认为这一水平会提高日本官员干预市场的风险。【原文：The yen is weakening toward 152 per dollar, a key level that traders see elevating risk that Japanese officials intervene in the market, as strong US factory data boosted the dollar.】

item.title: 安德雷蒂的人工智能 SPAC 交易未带来多少现金，股价暴跌 54
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Zapata Computing Holdings Inc. 在与前印地赛车手迈克尔-安德雷蒂（Michael Andretti）的空头支票公司合并后上市，尽管绝大多数公共投资者都放弃了这笔交易，但该公司在上市首日暴跌高达 54%。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Zapata Computing Holdings Inc. plunged as much as 54% in its debut after a merger with former IndyCar driver Michael Andretti’s blank-check firm brought the company public, despite the vast majority of public investors bailing on the deal.】

item.title: ISM 工厂指数强劲，国债收益率继续攀升
item.description: 由于美国制造业活动强于预期，美联储今年降息的前景更加令人怀疑，国债收益率周一大幅飙升。【原文：Treasury yields surged Monday as stronger-than-expected gauge of US manufacturing activity cast additional doubt on the outlook for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 壳牌聘请 Modec 推进巴西大型深水石油项目
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）在聘请 Modec 公司为一艘浮式生产船进行工程设计工作后，正在推进巴西的一项重大海上石油开发项目。【原文：Shell Plc is advancing a major offshore oil development in Brazil after hiring Modec Inc. to do engineering and design work for a floating production vessel.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产在流动性稀缺和美国数据影响下走低
item.description: 由于复活节周一欧洲、澳大利亚和香港多个市场休市，新兴市场资产周一在美国新数据和全球流动性依然稀缺的影响下走低。【原文：Emerging-market assets edged lower Monday amid fresh US data and still-thin global liquidity as several markets across Europe, Australia and Hong Kong are shut for Easter Monday.】

item.title: 暴跌还是暴涨？交易员正在为股市极端行情做准备
item.description: 刚刚从数十年来最强劲的 S&P 500 指数第一季度中获利的投资者们正在为接下来的走势做准备，不管是股价攀升还是跌回谷底。【原文：Investors who just booked profits from one of the strongest first quarters for the S&P 500 Index in decades are preparing for what comes next — whether that’s stocks climbing higher or crashing back to earth.】

item.title: 巴西特里奥斯公司将保持高产糖，因为同行正经受干旱考验
item.description: 法国 Tereos SCA 集团预计将在巴西保持强劲的食糖生产步伐，并计划在这个世界上最大的食糖出口国超越同行。【原文：French group Tereos SCA expects to keep a strong pace of sugar production in Brazil and plans to outperform peers in the world’s largest sugar-exporting nation.】

item.title: 拉扎德聘用花旗的阿里-赛义德（Ali Syed）负责主权财富基金业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，拉扎德公司聘请花旗集团董事总经理阿里-赛义德（Ali Syed）负责中东、亚洲和北美地区的主权财富基金和养老基金。【原文：Lazard Inc. hired Citigroup Inc. managing director Ali Syed to cover sovereign-wealth funds and pension funds in the Middle East, Asia and North America, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 私营监狱运营商 Geo 利用贷款市场进行再融资
item.description: 私营监狱运营商 Geo 集团公司正在利用债务市场，包括出售一笔 4 亿美元的杠杆贷款。【原文：Private prison operator Geo Group Inc. is tapping the debt market, including selling a $400 million leveraged loan, in a refinancing move that follows in the footsteps of a competitor who did the same just weeks ago.】

item.title: Twilio 在意外和解中将激进派 Sachem 负责人纳入董事会
item.description: Twilio Inc. 将把 Sachem Head Capital Management 公司的一位合伙人加入董事会，这一意外和解揭示了该公司股票中的第三位激进分子。【原文：Twilio Inc. is adding a partner at Sachem Head Capital Management to its board, in a surprise settlement that revealed a third activist in its stock.】

item.title: 澳大利亚房价涨幅扩大，成本上升也带来影响
item.description: 澳大利亚房地产市场在3月份连续第14个月上涨，但由于可负担性下降，借贷成本创下12年新高，导致澳大利亚两个最大城市的上涨势头减弱。【原文：Australia’s housing market extended gains to a 14th consecutive month in March amid declining affordability and borrowing costs at a 12-year high which cooled momentum in two of the nation’s biggest cities.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德 2,000 亿美元信贷集团寻求吸引保险公司
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）新成立的信贷部门将为母公司的保险业务提供服务，该部门的首席执行官表示，该部门还将为其他保险公司提供资产监管服务。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management’s newly formed credit arm will cater to its parent’s insurance business and will also pitch other insurers on overseeing their assets, the unit’s chief executive officer says.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行研究报告详述控制货币所需的数十亿资金
item.description: 根据一份员工文件，瑞士国家银行需要花费大约 270 亿瑞士法郎（约合 300 亿美元）才能使其货币不升值 1.1%。【原文：The Swiss National Bank needs to spend roughly 27 billion francs ($30 billion) to keep its currency from appreciating 1.1%, according to a staff paper that offers a rare vignette into what officials may be thinking.】

item.title: 报告警告：今年美国房屋保险费或将创历史新高
item.description:
预计今年美国房主保险的平均保费将达到2522美元，比2023年底增长6%。佛罗里达州的保费将接近 12,000 美元。【原文：

The average premium for US homeowners insurance is expected to hit $2,522 this year, up 6% from the end of 2023. Premiums in Florida will approach $12,000.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。周五的通胀数据公布后，股市有望高开，黄金创下新纪录，中国市场情绪回升。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Stocks are poised for higher open after Friday’s inflation data, gold hits a new record and sentiment in China is picking up. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】
